Html:
English: Default message, when rebooting a computer: (120 char. max)
German: Standardnachricht wenn ein Computer neugestartet wird: (max. 120 Zeichen)

English: This computer will reboot in [TIMER] seconds. Please, save your documents and close all applications.
German: Dieser Computer wird in [TIMER] Sekunden neustarten. Bitte speichern Sie ihre Dokumente und schlie√üen Sie alle Anwendungen.

Btw: It would be good, to have [TIMER] as a variable, which will be set automatically.

Regards
Norbert

It would be good, to have [TIMER] as a variable, which will be set automatically.
It's the case. When WPP send the message, [TIMER] is substituted with the value of the timer.
